djangotailoring.tracking.eventnames¶

This module contains a single class whose purpose is to encapsulate a set of general event names for use in any application. While this set is available, there is not requirement to use it.

EventNames¶

The EventNames namespace simply contains attribute values associated with strings of attribute names. The standard set is:

class djangotailoring.tracking.eventnames.EventNames¶
UserCreated = 'UserCreated'
UserPasswordChanged = 'UserPasswordChanged'
UserEmailSent = 'UserEmailSent'
UserConsented = 'UserConsented'
UserActivated = 'UserActivated'
UserWithdrawn = 'UserWithdrawn'
UserReset = 'UserReset'
UserLoggedIn = 'UserLoggedIn'

This is automatically created by djangotailoring.tracking when a user logs in.

UserLoggedOut = 'UserLoggedOut'

This is automatically created by djangotailoring.tracking when a user logs out.

PageViewed = 'PageViewed'

This is automatically created by djangotailoring.tracking.decorators.log_page_view() when a user visits a decorated view whose response status code is 200.

PageError = 'PageError'

This is automatically created by djangotailoring.tracking.decorators.log_page_view() when a user visits a decorated view whose response status code is anything but 200 or 302.

Redirected = 'Redirected'

This is automatically created by djangotailoring.tracking.decorators.log_page_view() when a user visits a decorated view whose response status code is 302.
